concept.title: 5235.070-1 Indemnification under research and development contracts.

conbody.p: (b) Submit requests for indemnification approval to DASN(P) by email at usn.pentagon.asstsecnavrdadc.mbx.pabt@us.navy.mil with the subject “[Activity Name] DFARS 235.070-1 – Indemnification Request under R&D Contracts.”
